title: Gnars dance?
body: Did they take the wada's out of gnars dance? I just played a game and he was just doing the dance and shaking, no wadas. That was my favorite part!

replies.body:
Hiya Nerd Bird! 

This a bug and is not intended. We're working to fix it! :]

In the future, please report bugs such as this on the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards. Thanks!
Well when did they do this? Why did they do this?
